channel.title: How do you change shop prices?
channel.description: How do you change the prices of items in shops? I saw a tutorial on it, but the link didn't work...[br][size=1]Posted on: May 28, 2007, 01:43:05 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?

item.title: How do you change shop prices?
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Open up item.cfg

Search the item u want to change the price

After the name u see the prices…

example…

3000000 3000000 3000000

This means it cost 3mil…

to change the price change the first 3 numbers

else u have a change u make it the max amount of cash wich u can change anymore then

Good luck

Thnx

Called Enzo

Read full topic
